misc.post:
This is my Grandfather. He was and still is a wonderful man. I Miss You So Much Grandpa.. I Love You.
   Love Your GrandDaughter,
                               Lauren Rose Lowry-Dreisbach
misc.title: New Dedication Page for the Blog: The Rev. Albert R. ‘Kim’ Dreisbach, Jr.
